author: Peter Wright
content: The 2022 film “Devotion” does a very good rendition of the biography of Jess L. Brown, I thoroughly reccomend it.

author: SGT SNUFFY
content: I wish people would call the man what he truly was, a Great Black American, the designating where their ancestors came from was intended to basically divide our society into sections, kind of like Balkanization. He was Born in the USA not Africa, he was a Black American who served his country with Honor and Sacrifice. God Bless Him.
